title: Frigidaire Gallery Stainless Steel Side-By-Side Refrigerator...
description:
Buy Frigidaire FGHS2655 - http://www.abt.com/product/69631/Frigidaire-FGHS2655PF.html
Shop Refrigerators - http://www.abt.com/category/117/Side-by-Side-Refrigerators.html

Features:
• Adjustable Interior Storage
Over 100 ways to organize and customize your refrigerator
• Best-in-Class Ice & Water Filtration
PureSource Ultra Water Filtration offers best-in-class water filtration so you get cleaner better-tasting water at your fingertips
• Largest Crisper Drawers
Store more in our largest capacity crisper drawers
• Smudge-Proof Stainless Steel
Protective coating reduces fingerprints and smudges so its easy to clean
• Humidity-Controlled Crisper Drawers
Keep your fruits and vegetables fresh in our humidity-controlled crisper drawers
• Designer Lighting
Beautiful ramp-up lighting keeps contents clearly visible
• Sliding SpillSafe Glass Shelves
Slide-out for easy access and are designed to keep spills contained making them easy to clean
• Deli Drawer
Keeps sandwich meats and cheeses organized in a convenient location
• Store-More™ Humidity-Controlled Crisper Drawers
Keep your fruits and vegetables fresh in our humidity-controlled crisper drawers
• Quick Ice
Quick Ice delivers up to 37 percent more ice
• Quick Freeze
Quickly freeze whatever you store to keep foods at their freshest
• PureAir Ultra Filters
Keeps the air cleaner and fresher
• Express-Select Controls
Easily select options with the touch of a button
• Energy Saver Plus Technology
Our refrigerator will automatically go into an energy-saving mode if not opened for 24 hours
• Automatic Alerts
Refrigerator alerts you if the door is left open or if temperature rises
